text: Alexander Thomson was a Scottish footballer who played as an inside forward. ==Career== Born in Coatbridge, Thomson played club football solely for Airdrieonians, and made one appearance for Scotland in 1909. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Airdrieonians F.C. (1878) players Category:Association football inside forwards Category:People from Coatbridge Category:Place of death missing Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Sportspeople from North Lanarkshire
title: Alexander Thomson (footballer)
